org.beanio.types

Class DoubleTypeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.beanio.types.LocaleSupport
      • org.beanio.types.NumberTypeHandler
        • org.beanio.types.DoubleTypeHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, ConfigurableTypeHandler, TypeHandler

    public class DoubleTypeHandler
extends NumberTypeHandler
    A type handler implementation for the Double class. If pattern is set, a DecimalFormat is used to parse and format the value. Otherwise, the value is parsed and formatted using the Double class.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    DecimalFormat

        public Class<?> getType()
